intro.text: Complete rebranding for a popular restaurant chain, including new visual identity and packaging design. This project showcases our ability to modernize traditional brands while preserving their authentic heritage.

content.content: Taste of Arabia needed a fresh brand identity to compete in the evolving food delivery market. The challenge was modernizing the brand while preserving the authentic Middle Eastern heritage that customers loved.

content.caption: The new brand identity reflects the warm, authentic atmosphere of traditional Middle Eastern dining

content.content: We created a vibrant visual identity with contemporary Arabic typography and appetizing food photography. The new logo combines traditional calligraphy with modern design elements, creating a bridge between heritage and innovation.

content.caption: New packaging design emphasizes freshness and authenticity while maintaining brand consistency
Updated signage and storefront design attracts new customers while maintaining brand recognition

content.content: The rebrand resulted in a 35% increase in brand recognition, 50% boost in delivery orders, and successful expansion to 5 new cities. The new identity successfully balances tradition with modern appeal.

testimonial.quote: The rebrand captured our essence perfectly. We've seen incredible growth since launching the new identity.
testimonial.author: Fatima Al-Zahra
